atbat.des: Jonathan Diaz reaches on a fielding error by pitcher Vin Mazzaro. Munenori Kawasaki advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by second baseman Michael Fransoso.
atbat.des_es: Jonathan Diaz se embasa por error en fildeo de lanzador Vin Mazzaro. Munenori Kawasaki avanza a la 3ra, on error en tiro de segunda base Michael Fransoso.

atbat.des: Kevin Nolan flies out to right fielder Josh Bell.
atbat.des_es: Kevin Nolan batea elevado de out a jardinero derecho Josh Bell.

atbat.des: Ricardo Nanita grounds out, second baseman Michael Fransoso to first baseman Travis Ishikawa. Munenori Kawasaki scores. Jonathan Diaz to 2nd.
atbat.des_es: Ricardo Nanita batea rodado de out a primera base Travis Ishikawa en jugada de infield fly. Munenori Kawasaki anota Jonathan Diaz a 2da.

atbat.des: Sean Ochinko singles on a ground ball to center fielder Josh Harrison. Jonathan Diaz scores.
atbat.des_es: Sean Ochinko pega sencillo con rodado a jardinero central Josh Harrison. Jonathan Diaz anota.

atbat.des: Josh Thole grounds out, third baseman Walker Gourley to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
atbat.des_es: Josh Thole batea rodado de out, tercera base Walker Gourley a primera base Travis Ishikawa.
